title: Open Tues 7:15-7:30pm,a half from Union Sq(536 Mason #403)
posting_body: ['4th Floor Studio', '* $1,350/month annual lease', '* Shared laundry', '* Elevator in building', '*', 'Available:', 'Now', 'OPEN HOUSE: Tuesday(8/2)', '7:15pm-7:30pm', 'Address:536 Mason #403', "Located in San Francisco's Downtown district, this fourth floor studio is just a block and a half from Union Square.", 'Bright, main room has a full wall of windows and a carpeted floor.', 'Kitchen is in an alcove, with the refrigerator just outside, and has a gas stove.', 'Deep walk-in closet is just outside the bath.', 'Bath has shower-over-tub.', 'Building has an elevator and shared laundry.', 'Many dining and shopping opportunities locally.', 'Walk Score 99, Transit Score 100.', 'Lots of public transportation possibilities include bus lines 2,3, 8,30, 45 and 38.', "BART's Powell Street Station is a five- block walk.", "Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.", 'Everest Mwamba', 'DRE# 01717299', 'Kenney & Everest Real Estate', 'DRE# 01984640', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Apply at KenneyandEverest .', 'com', 'Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
